name: rocm-gdb
description:
This is ROCmgdb, the ROCm source-level debugger for Linux, based on GDB,
the GNU source-level debugger.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: texinfo
dependencies.description:
Texinfo is the official documentation format of the GNU project. It was
invented by Richard Stallman and Bob Chassell many years ago, loosely
based on Brian Reid's Scribe and other formatting languages of the time.
It is used by many non-GNU projects as well.

dependencies.name: bison
dependencies.description:
Bison is a general-purpose parser generator that converts an annotated
context-free grammar into a deterministic LR or generalized LR (GLR)
parser employing LALR(1) parser tables.

dependencies.name: flex
dependencies.description: Flex is a tool for generating scanners.

dependencies.name: libunwind
dependencies.description:
A portable and efficient C programming interface (API) to determine the
call-chain of a program.

dependencies.name: expat
dependencies.description: Expat is an XML parser library written in C.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: babeltrace
dependencies.description:
Babeltrace is a trace viewer and converter reading and writing the
Common Trace Format (CTF). Its main use is to pretty-print CTF traces
into a human-readable text output ordered by time.

dependencies.name: rocm-dbgapi
dependencies.description:
The AMD Debugger API is a library that provides all the support
necessary for a debugger and other tools to perform low level control of
the execution and inspection of execution state of AMD's commercially
available GPU architectures.

dependencies.name: comgr
dependencies.description:
This provides various Lightning Compiler related services. It currently
contains one library, the Code Object Manager (Comgr)
